doc.title: map
doc.description: Iterate over array and return a new array.

content.name: map
content.description: creates a new array populated with the results of calling a provided function on every element in the calling array.

params.description: that is called for every element of arr. Each time callback executes, the returned value is added to new_array.
params.name: callback

content.summary: Iterate over array and return a new array.

returns.description: A new array with each element being the result of the callback function.

args.description: that is called for every element of arr. Each time callback executes, the returned value is added to new_array.
args.name: callback

esm.title: ESM
esm.text: See [ECMAScript Modules guide](https://fnsjs.dev/docs/) for more information
